name: Leaves On Board
description:
DESCRIPTION

Leaves have fallen on a wooden board. Collect them with a mouse. This is a casual game, inspired by a component of Symantec Game Pack. 

This is a simple project made in HTML5, it uses SVG images.

Credits: 

I took a cover image from https://jooinn.com/ (hard to specify exact link) .

I took leaf SVG files from here: 

https://unblast.com/5-free-light-wood-background-textures-jpg/

https://topfreedesigns.com/free-leaves-svg-bundle/

https://www.kotibeth.com/2009/11/free-fall-leaves-svg-files.html 

I may release new versions some time, add some mechanics, maybe some algorithms.
